description.value: Character can use Athletics Skill in place of Strength Characteristic for any Strength Tests made as part of a Grapple. When successfullly using the Damage Opponent Grapple Option, they deal additional Dmaage equal to the number of Degrees of Success by which they won the Opposed Test.

system.benefit: Character can use Athletics Skill in place of Strength Characteristic for any Strength Tests made as part of a Grapple. When successfullly using the Damage Opponent Grapple Option, they deal additional Dmaage equal to the number of Degrees of Success by which they won the Opposed Test.
